WorkItem.ClosedComment: 13 versions oldIf this is still an issue please resubmit with the Character file in question and related Version where the issue is still present.
WorkItem.Description:
I found several issues with the sheet:
Glyph of shadowbolt decreases dps (without glyph of lifetap or 4t7)
Imp Lifetap does not increase dps (tried without lifetap glyph and 4t7)
Equipping tier pieces doesn't check the tier bonuses on the buff tab.
The item list, when sorting by overall or alphabetical, appears empty.  Items are still there but not visable.
It's not possible to change the gem in the belt bs socket.
Only mana potions are selectable.
 
Things you probably already know but I'm listing them to be sure ; )
%healt talents not implemented (death embrace, Drain soul, Decimation)
Backdraft sequence not implemented
Doomguard and Infernal not implemented.
Pet buff not implemented (raid buff, raid debuff and pet food)
 
Sugestion
Having some way to permanently see a stat (like total dps) would help when selecting glyphs or distributing loose talent points.
 
Great work ^^ can't wait for the shhet to be completly operational.

Comments.Message:
Glyph of SB / Imp LT / Item list: could you attach a char file if this still happens?
Tier pieces: working in the dev version.
Belt gem: Rawr automatically select the best gem for BS sockets, there is no need to change it manually.
Mana pots: I don't understand what you mean by this. The mana pot selector will be gone soon, it doesn't do anything anyway.

Things you probably already know: yep, I know of these issues.
Total DPS: it's at the bottom in the newest version.
